Recken the Bold was a traveling priest from a religious order dedicated to Ilmater, who lived in the 9 century DR.
Recken the Bold was the second recipient of the Three White Doves, a powerful enchanted mace created by the priest Alledec in the . The mace was given to Recken the Bold by a certain Ilmatiri fighter. In turn, Recken lost the Three White Doves in a struggle against a powerful vampire near the Trollbark Forest. Even though the cleric emerged victorious, the Three White Doves were never recovered.
